O

Observers - Class in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Observers used to receive callbacks concerning Virtuoso's download engine (Observers.IEngineObserver), the communication with the C&C Backplane (Observers.IBackplaneObserver), changes to the Download Queue (Observers.IQueueObserver) and Subscriptions (Observers.ISubscriptionObserver)
Observers.IBackplaneObserver - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Interface for receiving callbacks concerning the Backplane.
Observers.IEngineObserver - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Interface for receiving callbacks about status and settings.
Observers.IObserver - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
The base Virtuoso Observer interface.
Observers.IQueueObserver - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Callbacks about changes in the download queue
Observers.ISubscriptionObserver - Interface in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Callbacks concerning Subscriptions.
OK - Static variable in class com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.AdmPushServiceAvailability

onQueuedWithAssetPermission(boolean, boolean, IAsset, int) - Method in interface com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver
Callback to report on Asset's permission check when added to the queue.
If the interface is provided to one of the Queue's Add methods then it will be called regardless of the RequirePermissionWhenQueued Setting.
